concept.title: Technology trends in the documentation lifecycle

prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

conbody.p: Integration of documentation editing, processing, managing, and publishing technologies with other technologies in the product lifecycle drives many of the current trends in the documentation lifecycle. Customizing documentation to meet customer requirements (for example, translation) is also extremely important. "Keeping writers happy" with tools they have grown comfortable using over time is relatively unimportant in the larger scheme of things.
